articles.author: Elizabeth Aubrey
articles.title: Pink Floyd producer claims Roger Waters used anti-Semitic language towards band's agent - NME
articles.description: Pink Floyd producer claims Roger Waters used anti-Semitic language towards band's agent
articles.content:
The producer of Pink Floyd’s ‘The Wall’ has claimed that Roger Waters exhibited anti-Semitic behaviour towards band’s agent.
It comes as a new documentary, The Dark Side of Roger Waters, explores al… [+4437 chars]
